items.content:
I am a full stack web developer. I have had a lot of experience with WordPress but my talents do not end there. My strengths truly lie in programming, PHP, JavaScript, SQL, UX design, jQuery, HTML, CSS... Familiar with Python, Java and Objective C. I have a lot of experience with web servers, mostly Linux, very good with Bash scripting. I have also designed many custom databases.

My most valuable skills are my ability to learn new things quickly and my desire for new challenges.
